title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
created_time: January 23, 2023, 10:22:10 AMLast edit: January 23, 2023, 02:29:07 PM by Frank AlpenCoin
content: HELLO!Alpen Coin has designed a card for Coldkey last year. The design was inspired by a famous painting of Ferdinand HODLER (What a name!!).Ferdinand Hodler (1853-1918), Le Lac de Thoune aux reflets symétriques, 1905.Huile sur toile, 80,2 x 100 cm © MAH Genève, photo : B. Jacot-Descombes Inv.1939-33Hodler is one of the most famous swiss painter. It was important for Alpen Coin to share our love for Art and Swiss Culture with bitcoiners.  That's why despite the COLDKEY Story we have made this card with SATOCHIP.LOTS- 1 Alpen Coin x COLDSCAM satodime card (3 have been printed)- 1 Alpen Coin x COLDSCAM satodime card (test print, Satochip has made 2 test prints)RULES- Choose a slot between 0 - f (no random) for lot 1 or lot 2- Requirements: Jr Member and up . No Newbie!- Last number of the hash of 2 blocks I choose will be the winner. [1 winner lot 1 and 1 winner  lot 2 ] Good luck to EverybodySlots:Lot 10 - Darker451  - Willi99742  -  tweetious3  -  hopenotlate4  - tldr-hodl5  - 5tift6  - 2stout7  - Stackinsats7778  - Buchi-889  - Remsjacka  - NeuroticFishb  - inthelongrunc  - PM-ICTd  - Doblezeroe  - Humble Bitcoinersf  - bitcoiner24hLot  20 - Thiago0071  - Hotdog72  - GazetaBitcoin3  - comit4  - geophphreigh5  - Maus07286  - Suzuki Matt7  - Krogoth8  - bitbollo9  - Mbitra  - rat03gopohb  - JanEmilc  - haloxond  - Mortaree  - Crytocanukf  - MitchellDon't trust verifynot your keys, not your coins.be strong, be a HODLER
